contest-event.event-date: Oct. 10, 1964 D National Mineworkers (Third Section) National Mineworkers (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-third-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Third Three Days Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 8 bands competed.
